Description

Atlassian Connector for IntelliJ IDEA provides integration for the following Atlassian products:

  1. JIRA 3.12 and above
  2. Bamboo 2.2.4 and above
  3. Crucible 2.0 and above
  4. FishEye 2.0 and above

For more information, please see the website.

Change Notes

Important Note when Upgrading

Crucible and FishEye are no longer supported in this version of the Atlassian Connector for IntelliJ IDEA. The only features that remain are:

  1. Create Pre-commit Reviews in Crucible
  2. Open files in IntelliJ IDEA from FishEye

For more details, please read the announcement.

New Features

  1. Compatibility with IDEA X - the connector works in IDEA 10.0.1 and above
  2. Multiple Bamboo jobs - unit tests are shown grouped by Job for plans with multiple jobs in Bamboo
  3. Added support for Bamboo 2.7 and above
  4. Easier pre-commit review creation - you can now easily create pre-commmit reviews in one step
  5. Lots of bug fixes

Fore more information please see the Release Notes.
